servinfo.title: Magnet Clutch Operating Check (M16A Model)

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Compressor Assembly Removal and Installation (M16A Model):M16A, J20A and F9Q Model

servinfo.ptxt: If any detects are found, repair or replace magnet clutch assembly.

item.ptxt: Inspect armature plate and rotor for signs of oil.
Check clutch bearings for noise and grease leakage.
Using an ohmmeter (3), measure resistance of stator coil between clutch lead wire (1) and body ground (2).
If measured resistance is not within tolerance, replace coil.
